onright.condition: Skin.HasSetting(slideshow.home) + [!Skin.HasSetting(home.widgets.tvmovies) + Container(9000).HasFocus(1)] | [!Skin.HasSetting(home.widgets.tvmovies) + Container(9000).HasFocus(2)] | [!Skin.HasSetting(home.widgets.movies) + Container(9000).HasFocus(3)] | [!Skin.HasSetting(home.widgets.movies) + Container(9000).HasFocus(4)] | [!Skin.HasSetting(home.widgets.tvshows) + Container(9000).HasFocus(5)] | [!Skin.HasSetting(home.widgets.tvshows) + Container(9000).HasFocus(6)] | [!Skin.HasSetting(home.widgets.music) + Container(9000).HasFocus(9)] | [!Skin.HasSetting(home.widgets.music) + Container(9000).HasFocus(10)] | [!Skin.HasSetting(home.widgets.addons) + Container(9000).HasFocus(13)] | [!Skin.HasSetting(home.widgets.addons) + Container(9000).HasFocus(14)] | [!Skin.HasSetting(home.widgets.weather) + Container(9000).HasFocus(17)]

Skin.HasSetting(slideshow.home) + ![!Skin.HasSetting(home.widgets.tvmovies) + Container(9000).HasFocus(1)] + ![!Skin.HasSetting(home.widgets.tvmovies) + Container(9000).HasFocus(2)] + ![!Skin.HasSetting(home.widgets.movies) + Container(9000).HasFocus(3)] + ![!Skin.HasSetting(home.widgets.movies) + Container(9000).HasFocus(4)] + ![!Skin.HasSetting(home.widgets.tvshows) + Container(9000).HasFocus(5)] + ![!Skin.HasSetting(home.widgets.tvshows) + Container(9000).HasFocus(6)] + ![!Skin.HasSetting(home.widgets.music) + Container(9000).HasFocus(9)] + ![!Skin.HasSetting(home.widgets.music) + Container(9000).HasFocus(10)] + ![!Skin.HasSetting(home.widgets.addons) + Container(9000).HasFocus(13)] + ![!Skin.HasSetting(home.widgets.addons) + Container(9000).HasFocus(14)] + ![!Skin.HasSetting(home.widgets.weather) + Container(9000).HasFocus(17)]

include.condition: [Skin.HasSetting(home.category1.addon) | Skin.HasSetting(home.category1.program) | Skin.HasSetting(home.category1.playlist) | Skin.HasSetting(home.category1.favourite)] | [Skin.HasSetting(home.category2.addon) | Skin.HasSetting(home.category2.program) | Skin.HasSetting(home.category2.playlist) | Skin.HasSetting(home.category2.favourite)] | [Skin.HasSetting(home.category3.addon) | Skin.HasSetting(home.category3.program) | Skin.HasSetting(home.category3.playlist) | Skin.HasSetting(home.category3.favourite)] | [Skin.HasSetting(home.category4.addon) | Skin.HasSetting(home.category4.program) | Skin.HasSetting(home.category4.playlist) | Skin.HasSetting(home.category4.favourite)] | [Skin.HasSetting(home.category5.addon) | Skin.HasSetting(home.category5.program) | Skin.HasSetting(home.category5.playlist) | Skin.HasSetting(home.category5.favourite)]

![Skin.HasSetting(home.category1.addon) | Skin.HasSetting(home.category1.program) | Skin.HasSetting(home.category1.playlist) | Skin.HasSetting(home.category1.favourite)] + ![Skin.HasSetting(home.category2.addon) | Skin.HasSetting(home.category2.program) | Skin.HasSetting(home.category2.playlist) | Skin.HasSetting(home.category2.favourite)] + ![Skin.HasSetting(home.category3.addon) | Skin.HasSetting(home.category3.program) | Skin.HasSetting(home.category3.playlist) | Skin.HasSetting(home.category3.favourite)] + ![Skin.HasSetting(home.category4.addon) | Skin.HasSetting(home.category4.program) | Skin.HasSetting(home.category4.playlist) | Skin.HasSetting(home.category4.favourite)] + ![Skin.HasSetting(home.category5.addon) | Skin.HasSetting(home.category5.program) | Skin.HasSetting(home.category5.playlist) | Skin.HasSetting(home.category5.favourite)]

item.label: $VAR[tvshows_homemenu]
item.visible: !Skin.HasSetting(homemenu.videos) + ![IsEmpty(Skin.String(videomenu.playlist1.path)) + IsEmpty(Skin.String(videomenu.playlist2.path)) + IsEmpty(Skin.String(videomenu.playlist4.path)) + IsEmpty(Skin.String(videomenu.playlist4.path)) + IsEmpty(Skin.String(videomenu.playlist5.path)) + IsEmpty(Skin.String(videomenu.playlist6.path)) + IsEmpty(Skin.String(videomenu.playlist7.path)) + IsEmpty(Skin.String(videomenu.playlist8.path))+ IsEmpty(Skin.String(CustomVideo.1.Path)) + IsEmpty(Skin.String(CustomVideo.2.Path)) + IsEmpty(Skin.String(CustomVideo.3.Path)) + IsEmpty(Skin.String(CustomVideo.4.Path)) + IsEmpty(Skin.String(CustomVideo.5.Path)) + IsEmpty(Skin.String(CustomVideo.6.Path)) + IsEmpty(Skin.String(CustomVideo.7.Path)) + IsEmpty(Skin.String(CustomVideo.8.Path)) + Skin.HasSetting(videomenu.addons) + Skin.HasSetting(videomenu.videoplaylists)]

item.label: $VAR[tvshows_homemenu]
item.visible: !Skin.HasSetting(homemenu.videos) + IsEmpty(Skin.String(videomenu.playlist1.path)) + IsEmpty(Skin.String(videomenu.playlist2.path)) + IsEmpty(Skin.String(videomenu.playlist4.path)) + IsEmpty(Skin.String(videomenu.playlist4.path)) + IsEmpty(Skin.String(videomenu.playlist5.path)) + IsEmpty(Skin.String(videomenu.playlist6.path)) + IsEmpty(Skin.String(videomenu.playlist7.path)) + IsEmpty(Skin.String(videomenu.playlist8.path)) + IsEmpty(Skin.String(CustomVideo.1.Path)) + IsEmpty(Skin.String(CustomVideo.2.Path)) + IsEmpty(Skin.String(CustomVideo.3.Path)) + IsEmpty(Skin.String(CustomVideo.4.Path)) + IsEmpty(Skin.String(CustomVideo.5.Path)) + IsEmpty(Skin.String(CustomVideo.6.Path)) + IsEmpty(Skin.String(CustomVideo.7.Path)) + IsEmpty(Skin.String(CustomVideo.8.Path)) + Skin.HasSetting(videomenu.addons) + Skin.HasSetting(videomenu.videoplaylists)

item.label: $VAR[movies_homemenu]
item.visible: Library.HasContent(movies) + !Skin.HasSetting(homemenu.movies) + [Skin.HasSetting(moviesmenu.watchlist) | Skin.HasSetting(moviesmenu.recent) | Skin.HasSetting(moviesmenu.unwatched) | Skin.HasSetting(moviesmenu.inprogress) | Skin.HasSetting(moviesmenu.trailers) | Skin.HasSetting(moviesmenu.genres) | Skin.HasSetting(moviesmenu.years) | Skin.HasSetting(moviesmenu.actors) | Skin.HasSetting(moviesmenu.moviesets) | Skin.HasSetting(moviesmenu.randomgenre) | Skin.HasSetting(moviesmenu.randommovie)]

item.label: $VAR[movies_homemenu]
item.visible: Library.HasContent(movies) + !Skin.HasSetting(homemenu.movies) + ![Skin.HasSetting(moviesmenu.watchlist) | Skin.HasSetting(moviesmenu.recent) | Skin.HasSetting(moviesmenu.unwatched) | Skin.HasSetting(moviesmenu.inprogress) | Skin.HasSetting(moviesmenu.trailers) | Skin.HasSetting(moviesmenu.genres) | Skin.HasSetting(moviesmenu.years) | Skin.HasSetting(moviesmenu.actors) | Skin.HasSetting(moviesmenu.moviesets) | Skin.HasSetting(moviesmenu.randomgenre) | Skin.HasSetting(moviesmenu.randommovie)]

item.label: $VAR[tvshows_homemenu_tvshows]
item.visible: Library.HasContent(tvshows) + !Skin.HasSetting(homemenu.tvshows) + [Skin.HasSetting(tvshowsmenu.watchlist) | Skin.HasSetting(tvshowsmenu.recent) | Skin.HasSetting(tvshowsmenu.unwatched) | Skin.HasSetting(tvshowsmenu.inprogress) | Skin.HasSetting(tvshowsmenu.genres) | Skin.HasSetting(tvshowsmenu.years) | Skin.HasSetting(tvshowsmenu.actors) | Skin.HasSetting(tvshowsmenu.guide)]

item.label: $VAR[tvshows_homemenu_tvshows]
item.visible: Library.HasContent(tvshows) + !Skin.HasSetting(homemenu.tvshows) + ![Skin.HasSetting(tvshowsmenu.watchlist) | Skin.HasSetting(tvshowsmenu.recent) | Skin.HasSetting(tvshowsmenu.unwatched) | Skin.HasSetting(tvshowsmenu.inprogress) | Skin.HasSetting(tvshowsmenu.genres) | Skin.HasSetting(tvshowsmenu.years) | Skin.HasSetting(tvshowsmenu.actors) | Skin.HasSetting(tvshowsmenu.guide)]

item.label: $VAR[music_homemenu]
item.visible: !Skin.HasSetting(homemenu.music) + [Skin.HasSetting(musicmenu.recent) | Skin.HasSetting(musicmenu.artists) | Skin.HasSetting(musicmenu.played) | Skin.HasSetting(musicmenu.genres) | Skin.HasSetting(musicmenu.addons) | Skin.HasSetting(musicmenu.playlists) | Skin.HasSetting(musicmenu.partymode) | Skin.HasSetting(musicmenu.lastfm) | Skin.HasSetting(musicmenu.videos) | !IsEmpty(Skin.String(musicmenu.playlist1.path)) | !IsEmpty(Skin.String(CustomMusic.1.Path))]

item.label: $VAR[music_homemenu]
item.visible: !Skin.HasSetting(homemenu.music) + ![Skin.HasSetting(musicmenu.recent) | Skin.HasSetting(musicmenu.artists) | Skin.HasSetting(musicmenu.played) | Skin.HasSetting(musicmenu.genres) | Skin.HasSetting(musicmenu.addons) | Skin.HasSetting(musicmenu.playlists) | Skin.HasSetting(musicmenu.partymode) | Skin.HasSetting(musicmenu.lastfm) | Skin.HasSetting(musicmenu.videos) | !IsEmpty(Skin.String(musicmenu.playlist1.path)) | !IsEmpty(Skin.String(CustomMusic.1.Path))]

item.label: $VAR[weather_homemenu]
item.visible: !Skin.HasSetting(homemenu.weather) + Weather.IsFetched + [[!Skin.HasSetting(home.widgets.tvmovies) + Container(9000).HasFocus(1)] | [!Skin.HasSetting(home.widgets.tvmovies) + Container(9000).HasFocus(2)] | [!Skin.HasSetting(home.widgets.movies) + Container(9000).HasFocus(3)] | [!Skin.HasSetting(home.widgets.movies) + Container(9000).HasFocus(4)] | [!Skin.HasSetting(home.widgets.tvshows) + Container(9000).HasFocus(5)] | [!Skin.HasSetting(home.widgets.tvshows) + Container(9000).HasFocus(6)] | [!Skin.HasSetting(home.widgets.music) + Container(9000).HasFocus(9)] | [!Skin.HasSetting(home.widgets.music) + Container(9000).HasFocus(10)] | [!Skin.HasSetting(home.widgets.addons) + Container(9000).HasFocus(13)] | [!Skin.HasSetting(home.widgets.addons) + Container(9000).HasFocus(14)] | [!Skin.HasSetting(home.widgets.weather) + Container(9000).HasFocus(17)]]

item.label: $INFO[Weather.Temperature]$INFO[Window(Weather).Property(Location), in ,]
item.visible: !Skin.HasSetting(homemenu.weather) + Weather.IsFetched + ![!Skin.HasSetting(home.widgets.tvmovies) + Container(9000).HasFocus(1)] + ![!Skin.HasSetting(home.widgets.tvmovies) + Container(9000).HasFocus(2)] + ![!Skin.HasSetting(home.widgets.movies) + Container(9000).HasFocus(3)] + ![!Skin.HasSetting(home.widgets.movies) + Container(9000).HasFocus(4)] + ![!Skin.HasSetting(home.widgets.tvshows) + Container(9000).HasFocus(5)] + ![!Skin.HasSetting(home.widgets.tvshows) + Container(9000).HasFocus(6)] + ![!Skin.HasSetting(home.widgets.music) + Container(9000).HasFocus(9)] + ![!Skin.HasSetting(home.widgets.music) + Container(9000).HasFocus(10)] + ![!Skin.HasSetting(home.widgets.addons) + Container(9000).HasFocus(13)] + ![!Skin.HasSetting(home.widgets.addons) + Container(9000).HasFocus(14)] + ![!Skin.HasSetting(home.widgets.weather) + Container(9000).HasFocus(17)]
